name: mysticz ballz
description:
You are a magician that wake up in another world and have to avoid the bigs purple balls.

To play: drag and drop character.

Scratch link: mysticz ballz on Scratch (mit.edu)

And I just just want to make a little shoutout to my friend who help me with testing the game.

(I made the game in 4 days because I saw the jam very late.)
